# Contributing to This Project

Welcome! Whether you're here to fix a bug, improve documentation, or suggest a new featureâ€”thank you for your interest in contributing.

## ðŸ›  Getting Started

To contribute:

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork
3. Create a new branch
4. Make your changes
5. Run tests:
   uv run pytest -vv
6. Commit and push
7. Open a pull request

## ðŸ’¬ Communication

If you're unsure about anything, feel free to open an issue for discussion. Suggestions, questions, and feedback are always welcome.

Thanks for helping improve the project!
